short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provides a quick tab auto-refresh toolbar control.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Quick Auto-Refresh extension that lets users effortlessly configure, start, and cancel ad-hoc reload timers for any open tab. Choose from built-in intervals or create custom ones tailored to your needs. With an intuitive interface, starting or stopping timers takes just a click or two. Whether youâ€™re tracking live updates or ensuring tabs stay up-to-date, Quick Auto-Refresh makes it simple to keep your browsing experience fresh and hassle-free.
